title: Terahertz thermal curve analysis for label-free identification of pathogens

title: Single-particle photoacoustic vibrational spectroscopy using optical microresonators
description: Natural vibrations of mesoscopic particles, such as living cells, are typically faint; occurring at megahertz to gigahertz frequencies also makes detection challenging. Now, researchers demonstrate real-time measurement of natural vibrations of single mesoscopic particles by using photoacoustic excitation and acoustic coupling to an optical microresonator for readout.
